meta.name: viewport

p.span: Students and parents are reminded please that students are not to have weapons in school or in cars, even hunting guns in trunks. District policy reads, Possessing, using, threatening to use, or transferring any weapon or instrument capable (with intent) of inflicting bodily injury, will result in expulsion and police involvement. Please be certain not to leave a hunting gun or knife on your person or in your vehicle.

div.p: Under the District menu, located on the employment opportunities page you will find a document with information if you have any interest in being a substitute teacher. If you have any interest we encourage you to take a look.

strong.em: Interested in being a substitute teacher?

p.span:
222 E. Lapeer St. Peck , MI 48466
www.peckschools.net
